person.persName: Stephen Gano Burbridge (Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Georgetown, Kentucky, native. Son of Robert Burbridge and Elizabeth Barnes Burbridge. Married to Elizabeth "Lizzie" M. Burbridge. Father of Albert G. Burbridge, Maggie L. Burbridge, and Lizzie Burbridge. Attended Georgetown College in Georgetown. Attended the Frankfort Military Institute in Frankfort, Kentucky. Resident of Logan County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860. Colonel of the 26th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from August 1861 to June 1862. Promoted to brigadier general of volunteers on June 9, 1862. Brevetted major general of volunteers on July 4, 1864. Commander of the Military District of Kentucky in the Department of the Ohio from August 1864 to February 1865. Resigned in December 1865.
